required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Retrospective Evaluation of Cellulite of Laxity Treatment Using Body Tite
clinical_study.official_title: Retrospective Evaluation of Cellulite of Laxity Treatment Using Body Tite

brief_summary.textblock: Retrospective Evaluation of Cellulite of Laxity Treatment Using Body Tite

detailed_description.textblock: The purpose of this preliminary report is to retrospectively evaluate this novel treatment approach to improve the appearance of cellulite on the thighs and buttocks by tightening the SFS using RFAL.

primary_outcome.time_frame: [ Time Frame: Baseline to 6 months posttreatment]
primary_outcome.description: Change in Photonumeric Cellulite Severity Score 3. Investigator assessment of the cellulite improvement comparing pre and post treatment using Global aesthetic improvement 5-point grading scale (0=No change, 1=1%-24%%, 2=25%-49%, 3=50%-74% improvement, and 4=75%-100%) at all follow up visits.

intervention.description: retrospectively evaluate this novel treatment approach to improve the appearance of cellulite on the thighs and buttocks by tightening the SFS using RFAL.

study_pop.textblock: Sample size will be a result of available charts from a 16-month retrospective review January 2018 - May 2019. The sample will not include any vulnerable populations (pregnant women, minors, or prisoners)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age â‰¥ 18years of age at the time of procedure
- patients with localized lipodystrophy in the medial or lateral thigh, and visible cellulite of laxity in the lower extremity or buttocks
- BodyTite treatments performed from January 2018 - May 2019 for Cellulite indication
Exclusion Criteria:
- active infection, collagen disorders, immunocompromised state, medications that mitigate inflammatory response, and propensity for keloid/hypertrophic scaring. o BodyTite treatments performed from March 2018 - May 2019 for lipodystrophy and cellulite of laxity
